meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Amanda Johnson Grant Hutchinson Heather Groggel Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4415.

div.div:
2003 College Championship quarterfinal game 5.
From Yale University.

td.p: Amanda Johnson, a sophomore at the University of Chicago from Cincinnati, Ohio
Grant Hutchinson, a freshman at the University of West Florida from Pensacola, Florida
Heather Groggel, a junior at Concordia University Wisconsin from Oxford, Ohio

tr.td: HISTORIC QUOTES
COLLEGE MOVIES
FARAWAY PLACES
HERE'S A 20
SIGNS OF THE ZODIAC
THE "IV" LEAGUE

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'In 1543 this Polish astronomer wrote, "Finally we shall place the sun himself at the center of the universe"')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: In 1543 this Polish astronomer wrote, "Finally we shall place the sun himself at the center of the universe"
